remarks: Define the class of all lattices.  A lattice is a poset in which the join and meet of any two elements always exists.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)  (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement: df-lat $p |- Lat = { p e. Poset | ( dom ( join ` p ) = ( ( Base ` p ) X. ( Base ` p ) ) /\ dom ( meet ` p ) = ( ( Base ` p ) X. ( Base ` p ) ) ) } $.
